title: EcoFlow Launched DELTA 2 Max - The Ultimate Portable Power Station to Power Every Day for 10 Years - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow's DELTA 2 Max is a portable power station with a base capacity of 2,048Wh, which can be expanded up to 6,144Wh. It uses premium LFP batteries, providing the longest-lasting battery life on the market, and can be charged by AC from 0 to 100% in 81 minutes or by solar from 0 to 100% in 2.3 hours. The DELTA 2 Max is equipped with a 2400W AC output that can power 99% of home appliances including hair dryers, water heaters, microwaves, and air conditioners.
greenwashing: This article does not appear to be an example of greenwashing because it is based on a real product with real benefits.

title: EcoFlow Expands European Reach with PowerStream Balcony Solar System and EU Headquarters in DÃ¼sseldorf - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow, a leading eco-friendly energy solutions company, has launched its latest innovation: the EcoFlow PowerStream, the first balcony solar system with a portable power station. The PowerStream allows users to access solar energy day and night while reducing energy bills and providing backup power. The PowerStream is a complete solution that includes the EcoFlow PowerStream Microinverter, solar panels, Smart Plugs and the EcoFlow app for real-time energy usage monitoring and optimisation.
